get-help.title: Get help
get_help.add_report_sheet.title: Anything wrong?
get_help.add_report_sheet.description: Let us know! We are here for you 24/7
get_help.regulations.title: Safety regulations
get_help.faq.title: FAQ
get_help.contact_us.title: Contact us
get_help.contact_us.email_description: Need our assistance? Our support team is here to assist you 24/7. Give us a call, send us an email or live chat and get your issue resolved now!
get_help.contact_us.address_description: We have our head-office located in City, Country and our regional offices across all cities of our operations. Our team consists of over 30 dedicated members who are actively working to ensure a seamless, secure and hassle-free mobility experience for our consumers.
driver_licence.title: Driver licence
driver_licence.description: Before you rent a car, let's validate your driver's license. Simply upload a scanned picture of your driver's license and we will get back to you upon validation.
driver_licence.validation.progress.title: Driver licence validation is in progress
driver_licence.validation.success.title: Your driver’s license has been validated successfully!
driver_licence.validation.invalid.title:
Your driver's license
has been declined.
driver_licence.validation.progress.descr: A confirmation email will be sent to your registered email upon validation.
driver_licence.invalid.description: Please retry again with a clearly readable picture and make sure that the license is not expired
driver_licence.driver.photograph: On this side is a photograph of the driver
driver_licence.vehicle.info: On this side is information about vehicle categories
driver_licence.submit.description: We’ll send you a notification with our decision
driver_licence.submit_success.dialog.des: We will validate your driver’s licence and send you a notification!
get_help.how_to_ride.scan_qr.title: Scan QR code
get_help.how_to_ride.scan_qr.description: To start a ride, you need to scan a QR code which you can find it on the vehicle’s handlebar or front panel
get_help.how_to_ride.payment_method.desc: Ruler offers multiple payment gateways. Whether you prefer payment with your debit/credit card or you want to use Apple Pay or Google Pay, we have it all.
get_help.how_to_ride.start_trip.title: How to start a trip?
get_help.how_to_ride.start_trip.descript: Starting a trip is as simple as scanning a bar-code. Just scan the bar-code on a handlebar of a scooter and that’s it.
get_help.how_to_ride.watch_areas.title: Watch the areas
get_help.how_to_ride.watch_areas.descrip: There are certain zones highlighted as red points on the map e.g. a no-parking zone. Please pay attention to these zones.
get_help.how_to_ride.trip_status.title: Manage trip status
get_help.how_to_ride.trip_status.descrip: Changing a trip status is important as it help us track your ride. For a bike, a trip can either be Unlocked, In-ride, Finished, and Completed.
wallets.title: Wallets
wallets.create_wallet.dialog.title: Wallet created!
wallets.create_wallet.dialog.description: Your crypto wallet has been successfully created!
wallets.create_wallet.title: Create Wallet
wallets.create_wallet.description: In the next step, you will see 9 words that will allow you to restore your wallet. If you lose the secret words you would lose access to your wallet
wallets.create_wallet.store.description: Record or copy these words in the correct order and store them in a safe place.
wallets.create_wallet.place.description: Click on words to place them next to each other in the correct order
wallets.create_wallet.place.error_messag: Wrong order! Try one more time
wallets.add_funds.title: Add Funds
wallets.add_funds.helper_text.wallet_typ: Choose the wallet you want to add funds
wallets.add_credit_card.title: Add Credit Card
wallets.template.title: Template
wallets.transfer.title: Transfer
wallets.transfer.wallet_address_descript: Recipient wallet address or scan QR
wallets.confirmation.title: Confirmation
wallets.confirmation.dialog.title: Transaction completed
wallets.confirmation.dialog.description: Your wallet has been successfully replenished
wallets.ruler_wallet.title: Ruler wallet
